title: Gain Momentum
excerpt: Most organizations don’t fail because they lack strategy. They fail because execution gets fragmented, progress becomes invisible, and priorities drift. Here’s a practical POV on how operators gain momentum.
author: New Wave Associates
content:
Why momentum matters

Momentum is the difference between a plan that lives in slides and a plan that changes reality.

The pattern we see

Strategy is rarely the issue. Execution is.

How to gain momentum

  • Own the outcome
  • Make work visible
  • Shorten decision cycles
  • Operate in waves
